    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <title>
            <string language="es">La monarquía (753 a.C- 509 a.c)</string>
            <string language="en">The monarchy  (753 b.C - 509 b.c)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Monarchie (753 b.C - 509 b.c)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La monarchie (753 b.C - 509 b.c)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O monarchy (753 b.C - 509 b.c)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il monarchy (753 b.C - 509 b.c)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μοναρχία (753 b.C - 509 b.c)</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Breve sinopsis de la época monárquica romana con actividades, cuadros desplegables, textos, imágenes y enlaces a glosario.</string>
            <string language="en">Brief summary of the Roman monarchical age with activities, pop up figures, texts, images and links to a glossary.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Roma</string>
            <string language="en">Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">monarquía</string>
            <string language="en">Monarchy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurze Zusammenfassung des römischen monarchical 
Alters mit Aktivitäten, knallen oben Abbildungen, Texte, Bilder und 
Links zu einem Glossar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le bref sommaire de l'âge monarchique romain avec 
des activités, sautent vers le haut des figures, des textes, des 
images et des liens à un glossaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O sumário breve da idade monarchical roman com 
atividades, estala acima figuras, textos, imagens e ligações a um 
glossário.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il breve sommario dell'età monarchical romana con
le attività, schiocca in su le figure, i testi, le immagini ed i 
collegamenti ad un glossario.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η συνοπτική περίληψη της ρωμαϊκής μοναρχικής ηλικίας
με τις δραστηριότητες, σκάει επάνω τους αριθμούς, τα κείμενα, τις
εικόνες και τις συνδέσεις με ένα γλωσσάρι.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Monarchie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Monarchie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρώμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μοναρχία</string>
          </keyword>
